text: Cyrus Mistry (born Cyrus Pallonji Mistry; 4 July 1968 â€“ 4 September 2022), was an Indian businessman. He was the chairperson of Tata Group from 2012 to 2016. He was the sixth chairman of the group. He was born in present-day Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Mistry was killed in a car crash on 4 September 2022 in Charoti, India at the age of 54. His father, Pallonji Mistry died two months before him. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Road accident deaths
title: Cyrus Mistry
